留.definition: to leave (a message etc); to retain; to stay; to remain; to keep; to preserve

留一手.definition: to hold back a trick; not to divulge all one's trade secrets

留下.definition: to leave behind; to stay behind; to remain; to keep; not to let (sb) go

留任.definition: to remain in office; to hold on to one's job

留住.definition: to ask sb to stay; to keep sb for the night; to await (classical)

留作.definition: to set aside for; to keep as

留傳.definition: to bequeath (to later generations); a legacy

留別.definition: a departing gift; a souvenir on leaving; a poem to mark one's departure

留名.definition: to leave one's name; to leave one's mark

留堂.definition: to stay behind (after class); to be given detention; detention

留壩.definition: Liuba County in Hanzhong 漢中|汉中[Han4 zhong1], Shaanxi

留壩縣.definition: Liuba County in Hanzhong 漢中|汉中[Han4 zhong1], Shaanxi

留存.definition: to keep; to preserve; extant; to remain (from the past)

留學生.definition: student studying abroad; returned student; foreign student; international student

留守.definition: to stay behind to take care of things

留守兒童.definition: "left-behind children", rural children whose parents have to make a living as migrant workers in distant urban areas, but cannot afford to keep the family with them

留客.definition: to ask a guest to stay; to detain a guest

留宿.definition: to put up a guest; to stay overnight

留尼旺.definition: Réunion (island in Indian Ocean, a French overseas department) (Tw)

留尼汪.definition: Réunion (island in Indian Ocean, a French overseas department)

留尾巴.definition: to leave loose ends; to leave matters unresolved

留底.definition: to keep a copy; copy kept for archiving; to put aside a portion (of a money sum)

留影.definition: to take a photo as a souvenir; a souvenir photo

留待.definition: to leave sth for later; to postpone (work, a decision etc)

留後路.definition: to leave oneself a way out

留得青山在，不怕沒柴燒.pinyin: liu2 de5 qing1 shan1 zai4 , bu4 pa4 mei2 chai2 shao1
留得青山在，不怕沒柴燒.definition: While the green hills last, there'll be wood to burn (idiom). Where there's life there's hope.

留心.definition: to be careful; to pay attention to

留心眼兒.definition: to be on the alert; to keep one's eyes open

留念.definition: to keep as a souvenir; to recall fondly

留情.definition: to relent (to spare sb's feelings); to show mercy or forgiveness; to forbear; lenient

留意.definition: to be mindful; to pay attention to; to take note of

留戀.definition: reluctant to leave; to hate to have to go; to recall fondly

留成.definition: to retain a portion (of profits etc)

留有.definition: to remain in existence; to retain

留有餘地.definition: to leave some leeway; to allow for the unpredictable

留校.definition: to join the faculty of one's alma mater upon graduation; to remain at school during vacation

留樣.definition: retention sample; (of a manufacturer, esp. of food or drugs) to retain a sample of a batch of a product (abbr. for 保留樣品|保留样品[bao3 liu2 yang4 pin3])

留步.definition: (said by departing guest) no need to see me out

留洋.definition: (old) to study abroad; (sports) to train abroad

留活口.definition: to capture alive a criminal (or enemy etc) for interrogation; (of a perpetrator) to let a witness live

留班.definition: to repeat a year in school

留用.definition: to keep for use; to retain sth; to keep sb in his job

留白.definition: to leave a message; to leave some empty space in a work of art; to leave idle moments (in one's life, a theater play etc)

留神.definition: to take care; to be careful

留種.definition: to keep a seed stock; seed held back for planting

留空.definition: to leave blank space in a document; to leave some time free

留級.definition: to repeat a year in school

留置.definition: to leave in place; to set aside (for further use); to retain; to detain (a suspect or offender); (medicine) indwelling

留職.definition: to keep an official position; to hold on to one's job

留芳千古.definition: a good reputation to last down the generations

留芳百世.definition: a good reputation to last a hundred generations

留觀.definition: (medicine) to remain in hospital under observation

留言.definition: to leave a message; to leave one's comments; message

留話.definition: to leave word; to leave a message

留連.definition: variant of 流連|流连[liu2 lian2]

留連果.definition: variant of 榴槤果|榴梿果, durian fruit

留連論詩.definition: to continue to discuss a poem over a long period

留里克.definition: Rurik (c. 830-879), Varangian chieftain of the Rus' people

留針.definition: to leave an inserted needle in place for a period of time (acupuncture)

留門.definition: to leave the door unlocked for sb

留難.definition: to make sth difficult; to create obstacles

留題.definition: extemporaneous thoughts noted down after a visit

留飯.definition: to put some food aside for sb; to invite sb to stay for a meal; invitation to dinner

留餘地.definition: to leave room to maneuver; to leave a margin for error

留駐.definition: to keep stationed (of troops); to remain as a garrison
